title: Ticket #4876: Set subsystem type in python bindings
description:
Currently, when parsing the param table, the python bindings can only use the "TOOL" subsystem.

When we want to write wrapper scripts around daemons, the python bindings will want to see the exact same configuration settings as the daemon (and perhaps log as the daemon). Hence, we should expose the subsystem configuration functions through the bindings.
